title: Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park: Research
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Research               Further Research         Historic photo of Civilian Conservation Corps reconstructing a portion of the Stone Wall held against the modern landscape NPS Photo    Are you writing a thesis? Interested in a particular battle? Had an ancestor who fought in the Civil War? The park has many resources available for visitors looking to further their research into the Civil War era!   Â    Learn More about the Civil War: Interested in a particular battle, soldier, or topic from the Civil War? Look through many resources to help with your research. Find your ancestor: Did you have an ancestor who fought during the Civil War? Discover how to learn more about your relative. Visit the park for research: Are you in the midst of a research project? Contact the park about doing research on site!
